messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] CHN conference June 11-12 - Riverside CA
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Connie, My family and I are coming to the conference but will only be there Sat. and Sun.  What day are you speaking? Kay ... From: conniecolten@aol.com To:
messages.messageBody:
Hi Connie,
My family and I are coming to the conference but will only be there Sat. and Sun. What day are you speaking?
Kay
----- Original Message -----
From: conniecolten@...
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 2004 8:43 AM
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] CHN conference June 11-12 - Riverside CA


Hi All,

I'm going to be speaking at the conference, and wanted to invite you to join
me at my sessions -

Hope to see you there!

Connie



CHN's Expo Committee
The BIG conference with the little price:
June 11th and 12th at the Riverside Convention Center


http://www.californiahomeschool.net/events/expo/familyexpo.htm

Friday: Magnolia, session 6 4:30-5:30
What I Wish I'd Have Known Back Then
Connie Colten
An unschooler talks about her 23 years of homeschool experience, wanting to
share her experience so you can benefit from what she's learned.


Saturday: University session 12 4:00-5:00
The Wonder and the Fun
Connie Colten
The author of Homeschooling Reflections reflects on her many years of raising
her five unschooled children. Did they get into college? And are they
socialized?

Bio:

> Connie Colten has spent her years raising five children, now ages 15-32
> (having them learn at home for the last 23 years), being a military wife
> (now divorced), a childbirth instructor, a La Leche League Leader, and running
> a homebusiness. Currently she is marketing her self-published book,
> Homeschooling Reflections, training to once again climb Mt. Whitney, and dancing
> every chance she gets.










[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
